name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling headphones with 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and frequent travelers. Features include active noise cancellation, comfortable over-ear design, and crisp, clear audio quality.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Soft, breathable, and eco-friendly cotton t-shirt. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Made from 100% organic cotton with a comfortable, relaxed fit.

name: The Art of Programming
description: A comprehensive guide to modern software development practices. Learn essential programming concepts, design patterns, and best practices from industry experts.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Modern desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Features touch controls, USB charging port, and energy-efficient LED bulbs. Perfect for your home office or study.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable keys and macro support. Cherry MX switches provide tactile feedback and durability for millions of keystrokes.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with modern fit. Timeless style that pairs well with any outfit. Made from durable denim fabric with metal buttons and multiple pockets.

name: JavaScript: The Definitive Guide
description: The comprehensive guide to JavaScript programming. Covers everything from basics to advanced topics, including ES6+ features, async programming, and modern frameworks.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 handcrafted ceramic mugs. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Each mug holds 12oz and features a comfortable handle and unique glaze pattern.

name: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity power bank with dual USB ports and fast charging. Keep your devices powered on the go. Features LED battery indicator and supports multiple charging protocols.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with excellent cushioning and support. Breathable mesh upper and durable rubber outsole. Perfect for daily runs and workouts.

name: Learning React
description: Master React.js with this hands-on guide. Learn hooks, state management, routing, and how to build modern web applications. Includes real-world projects and examples.

name: Minimalist Wall Clock
description: Sleek, modern wall clock with silent quartz movement. Perfect for any room in your home or office. Features a clean design with clear numbers and slim hands.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with adjustable DPI settings. 2.4GHz connection provides reliable performance. Comfortable grip for extended use and long battery life.

name: Hoodie Sweatshirt
description: Cozy pullover hoodie made from soft cotton blend. Features drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for casual wear and staying warm.

name: Clean Code
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship. Learn how to write code that is easy to read, maintain, and extend. Essential reading for all developers.

name: Scented Candle Set
description: Set of 3 premium soy wax candles in relaxing scents: lavender, vanilla, and eucalyptus. Burns clean for up to 40 hours each. Perfect for creating a cozy atmosphere.

name: USB-C Hub Adapter
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and more. Expand your laptop's connectivity with this compact adapter. Supports 4K video output.

name: Yoga Pants
description: High-waisted yoga pants with moisture-wicking fabric. Four-way stretch for maximum flexibility and comfort. Perfect for yoga, running, or everyday wear.

name: Design Patterns
description: Elements of reusable object-oriented software. Learn the 23 classic design patterns that have shaped software architecture. A must-read for serious developers.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board
description: Eco-friendly bamboo cutting board with juice groove. Naturally antimicrobial and gentle on knives. Large size perfect for meal prep. Easy to clean and maintain.
